text: The 2006 Asian Cycling Championships took place at the Kuala Lumpur City Hall Velodrome, Cheras, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia from 9 to 16 September 2006. ==Medal summary== ===Road=== ====Men==== {| |- |Individual road race | | | |- |Individual time trial | | | |- |Team time trial | Kim Dong-hun Lee Won-jae Park Sung-baek Youm Jung-hwan | Hossein Askari Ghader Mizbani Amir Zargari Abbas Saeidi Tanha | Yoshiyuki Abe Satoshi Hirose Makoto Iijima Masahiko Mifune |} ====Women==== {| |- |Individual road race | | | |- |Individual time trial | | | |} ===Track=== ====Men==== {| |- |Sprint | | | |- |1 km time trial | | | |- |Keirin | | | |- |Individual pursuit | | | |- |Points race | | | |- |Scratch | | | |- |Madison | Youm Jung-hwan Park Sung-baek | Cheung King Wai Wong Kam Po | Mehdi Sohrabi Amir Zargari |- |Team sprint | Zhang Lei Wu Dan Lin Feng | Kazuya Narita Tsubasa Kitatsuru Yudai Nitta | Mohd Rizal Tisin Mohd Hafiz Sufian Junaidi Nasir |- |Team pursuit | Jang Sun-jae Park Sung-baek Youm Jung-hwan Kim Dong-hun | Ghader Mizbani Alireza Haghi Abbas Saeidi Tanha Amir Zargari | Liu Chin-feng Lee Wei-cheng Lin Heng-hui Chen Chien-ting |} ====Women==== {| |- |Sprint | | | |- |500 m time trial | | | |- |Keirin | | | |- |Individual pursuit | | | |- |Points race | | | |- |Team sprint | Gong Jinjie Wang Jianling | Lee Min-hye You Jin-a | I Fang-ju Tseng Hsiao-chia |} ==Medal table== ==External links== * www.cyclingnews.com Asia Asia Cycling Category:Asian Cycling Championships Category:International cycle races hosted by Malaysia
title: 2006 Asian Cycling Championships
